Tanks

类 TestMainApp

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.TestMainApp

  • public class TestMainApp
extends java.lang.Object
    TestMainApp class contains unit tests for the main functionalities of the Tanks game.

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      TestMainApp()

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TestMainApp

        public TestMainApp()

    • 方法详细资料

      • testApp

        @Test
public void testApp()
        Entry point for testing the APP class. All test methods will be called here.

      • testKeyboard

        public void testKeyboard(App app)
        Tests keyboard controls for player actions.

        This method sequentially tests W, S, and arrow keys. W and S are used to control the turret power, W increases power and S decreases power. Arrow keys are used to rotate the turret and control the tank's movement. Fuel is consumed when moving, and movement is not possible without fuel.

        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testFire

        public void testFire(App app)
        Test whether firing after pressing the space bar works correctly.
        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testPurchase

        public void testPurchase(App app)
        Test whether the purchase functionality works correctly [COMP9003]

        1. Purchase parachute: need to consume 15 scores 2. Purchase larger projectiles: need to consume 20 scores 3. Purchase Repair kit: need to consume 20 scores 4. Purchase Additional Fuel: need to consume 10 scores

        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testFall

        public void testFall(App app)
        Test whether falling is correctly determined

        1. Destroyed when falling to the bottom. See @testRemovePlayer 2. The descent speed is different with and without parachutes, and without parachutes, HP is deducted 3. Falling caused by others, the opponent can get points

        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testWind

        public void testWind(App app)
        Test the effect of wind on projectile trajectory

        When firing projectiles at the same position, due to different wind strengths at different times, the x coordinates should be different after the same time t.

        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testAttack

        public void testAttack(App app)
        Test the effect of attacks

        After attacking, the position of the terrain should change and the person causing damage will get the opponent's HP drop amount as points

        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testRemovePlayer

        public void testRemovePlayer(App app)
        Test whether players can be removed correctly
        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testChangeLevel

        public void testChangeLevel(App app)
        Test whether level switching works correctly
        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testGameOver

        public void testGameOver(App app)
        Test whether the game ends correctly
        参数:
        app - The application instance.

      • testRestartGame

        public void testRestartGame(App app)
        Test whether the game can restart correctly
        参数:
        app - The application instance.
